channel.title: Latest from Android Central
channel.description: All the latest content from the Android Central team

item.title: Qualcomm earnings impress with record revenues, but the ongoing memory shortage soils its outlook as the entire industry braces for a tough year... or two
item.description: Qualcomm reports its FY Q1 2026 financial results, posting record total revenue but offering a cautious outlook amid the ongoing memory shortage.
item.author: derrek.lee@futurenet.com (Derrek Lee)
item.dc:creator: Derrek Lee

item.title: Alphabet outperforms expectations as Google Cloud surges in Q4 2025 earnings — and it's planning a massive reinvestment for 2026
item.description: Google's parent company outperformed Q4 2025 earnings expectations with significant year-over-year growth driven by its cloud and advertising divisions.
item.author: bradypsnyder@gmail.com (Brady Snyder)
item.dc:creator: Brady Snyder

media:content.media:text: A photo of the Google Logo surrounded by plants at the company's NYC headquarters building

item.title: Anker's 45W Nano Charger has ruined all other travel chargers for me — and it's because of this one feature
item.description: Anker's new Nano Charger 45W has a built-in panel and auto-senses iPhones. While that is undoubtedly cool, I like the charger because it has 180-degree foldable prongs, and that feature makes it my go-to travel GaN charger.

item.title: Motorola Edge 70 vs. Samsung Galaxy S25 Edge: The pursuit of slimness
